currentVoltage.schema:description: A measurement method based on the current-voltage plot of photovoltaic systems.

measurementSettings.schema:description: The settings for the equipment used to measure the current voltage.

sweepType.schema:description: The sweep method used for current voltage measurement.

polarity.schema:description: Positive or negative polarity for the voltage.

irradiance.schema:description: Measurement setting describing the intensity of the light energy.

flashDuration.schema:description: The amount of time for a flash during currentVoltage measurement.

timeStamp.schema:description: The time at which the specific current voltage measurement took place.

equipmentType.schema:description: The equipment used for the current voltage measurement.

spacialUniformity.schema:description: The measurement of how the irradiance varies over a defined area.

temporalStability.schema:description: The output of a solar system at a certain spot, comparing the max irradiance and minimum irradiance.

spectralClass.schema:description: Definition of how well the distribution of irradiance among different wavelengths approximates natural sunlight.

schema:measurementTechnique.schema:description: The technique used to measure the CurrentVoltage data. The value can be dark, illuminated, or pseudo.

analysis.schema:description: The curve fitting and associated parameters created from the curve fitting.

analysisMethod.schema:description: The curve fitting and analysis method used to create the current voltage curve

performanceParameters.schema:description: The extracted parameters from the current voltage measurement.

maximumPowerPoint.schema:description: The point on the power curve that has the highest power output, or the product of the voltage and current.

shuntResistance.schema:description: The slope of the dark current versus applied voltage.

seriesResistance.schema:description: Equivalent resistance throughout the solar cell.

fillFactor.schema:description: The ratio of the maximum power to the product of the short circuit current and open circuit voltage.

curves.schema:description: The base current voltage data that is to be used in the currentVoltage measurement method.
